mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `is_system` AS isSystem, a.`send_user_id` AS fromUserId, a.`receive_user_id` AS receiveUserId, `content` AS content, a.create_time AS send_time FROM (SELECT `send_user_id`, `receive_user_id`, MAX(create_time) AS create_time FROM `tb_message` GROUP BY `send_user_id`, `receive_user_id`) a LEFT JOIN `tb_message` t ON t.`send_user_id` = a.`send_user_id` AND t.`receive_user_id` = a.`receive_user_id` AND t.create_time = a.create_time WHERE (t.`send_user_id` = #{userId} AND t.`send_user_visible` = 0) OR (t.`receive_user_id` = #{userId} AND t.`receive_user_visible` = 0) ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
